scripts.build: (cd modules/core && npm run build) && (cd modules/cli && npm run build) && (cd modules/generators && for i in * ; do if [ -d $i ]; then (cd $i && npm run build); fi; done)
scripts.postinstall: (cd modules/core && npm install) && (cd modules/cli && npm install) && (cd modules/generators && for i in * ; do if [ -d $i ]; then (cd $i && npm install); fi; done)
scripts.watch: (cd modules/core && npm run watch &) && (cd modules/cli && npm run watch &) && (cd modules/generators && for i in * ; do if [ -d $i ]; then (cd $i && npm run watch &); fi; done)
